meanings.definition: To remove all contents from a container or space.
meanings.sent1: She is emptying the trash bin.
meanings.sent3: The magician kept emptying his hat, pulling out endless scarves.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed, emptying the room of tension.
meanings.sent5: The river rushed, emptying into the vast ocean.

meanings.definition: The act of making something empty.
meanings.sent1: The emptying of the cup was swift.
meanings.sent2: The emptying of the room signaled the end of the event.
meanings.sent3: The emptying of the cookie jar left him disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The emptying of the lake revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The emptying of the bottle brought a sense of finality.

meanings.sent1: The emptying of the tank happened gradually.
meanings.sent2: The emptying of the stadium after the game was orderly.
meanings.sent3: The emptying of the balloon made a funny squeaky sound.
meanings.sent4: The emptying of the clouds brought a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The emptying of the box revealed a surprise gift.
